Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text:
pros:
- good food, big portions
- interesting menu, everyone can find something for themselves ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Very chill vibe, great to sit down and have some drinks. Very nice staff. Also thanks to the girl behind the bar for the free beer that she had tapped by accident.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Very friendly atmosphere, good snacks, big cart of drinks and beers. Welcoming and smiling crew makes the place complete.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Cozy bar with reasonable prices, but the food is where it shines.  Massive portions, delicious and something for everyone, it's an unassuming gem in a fantastic location near the train station.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: I was pleasantly surprised with this tasty burger! A great place to stop in for lunch. The service was awesome and the food was delicious. We were so happy we stopped here.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Veggie burger! WOW WOW WOW, this has to be the best burger I have laid my taste buds on. Handmade patty with house ingredients. I highly recommend this location. Amazing staff, available sitting inside and out and a good selection of food at great prices!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Amazing food at a reasonable price. Nice interior with spacy windows and a good view on the canal. What to wish more for?

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: So where should I begin‚Ä¶ I have been sitting here for 50 minutes and my nachos still haven‚Äôt arrived. My pink gin and lemonade took 10 min. People are getting burgers, tacos and other food faster than us while we were sitting here first.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Great atmosphere for a bit more relaxing drink! Nice decor and friendly personell!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Very cute restaurant with really kind staff, really recommend this place :)

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Easily the best bar on the trip, super cosy, welcoming, great service and felt like we could have spent all day chatting and drinking Jupiler!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: The food here was DELICIOUS. My friends and I ordered their Angus Cheeseburgers and they were excellent. The service was perfect and the ambiance was very chill and welcoming. If you come to Amsterdam, stop by and have a burger from here!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text:
Great place to have some quality time with friends. The service was good as well as the winter cocktail that was served that night.
There are also some games to entertain yourselves with, I think it‚Äôs a great pro of this bar since it lets you get to do things with your friends you usually don‚Äôt do.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Waiter's rudeness made us leave prior to ordering. We were there at Christmas day and I asked for non alcoholic drinks menu(s) as we were 6 people not wanting alcohol and the menus on table offered only beers, spirits and food. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Very good service and good fondue!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: We stopped here yesterday for a quick drink. Walked in, said hello (got nothing back from either of the 2 staff members, maybe they hadn't heard us?) and put our bags & coats down at a table in the window. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Delicious nachos, tasty foundee, you can sit by the canal. The service is very  quick and attentive. Good experience!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Nice place to hang out with friends, nice beer selection and tasty burger.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text:
Great food, very friendly staff, and a nice part of town.
One complaint, the cat was VERY rude, ignored all my approaches, then sat on my seat the moment I got up to leave.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: I found this amazing place couple yrs ago while visiting AMS. Now I make sure to stop in for a meal every few months. Great food, great drinks. Fantastic service!!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Totally in love with this place! Good vibes, good music and awesome decors. Food was outstanding for such a small place. Would definitely go back!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Great for a solo mission or a quiet evening with someone special. You can chat at normal level. Lovely lighting. Not for large groups. In a word....mellow.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Terrific, sunny patio right on the canal. Friendly, attentive staff. Awesome, affordable specials. Good local beer on tap.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Great food and service. Really nice and easy going staff. Got a free after-dinner beer afterwards.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Small cozy bar in a great location.  Friendly staff and good range of food.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Good food, great staff

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Great place, good food and an awesome ambiance. Highly recommend the board of the day - a variety of delicious things.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Nice local place to grab a drink and some food with the locals in a very touristic area. Prices are good

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Perfect spot for a snack and pint. The staff was nice but we seemed to be a burden as tourists. This must be a local spot.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Good beer, nice burger. Slow service. I sat on the terrace. Nice place to be

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Great sharing platter, feast of meat cheese and bread. Friendly staff and fun atmosphere.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Staff are really attentive and the atmosphere is great Prices are reasonable and the food good bar fare

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Found this little gem while walking the canals in Amsterdam.  Staff are super friendly and everything was priced appropriately.  If you're in the neighborhood, stop by.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: This food is delicious and the local beer is great! Must try the kaas & bitterballen! Great service!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Staff is really friendly towards loud and drunk foreigners, drink list is huge, enough place to seat 10 or more people if asked beforehand

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Food and service were great also the prices were very reasonable for where it was located

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Simple food but made with feeling and very friendly and professional staff

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Nice atmosphere. Really good for a small stop while you're exploring the city center.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Very very good GIn&Tonics, cool musik, good service. Chillout Pub!!!

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: Great Tavern. Excellent games inside. Specially huge playing cards

Review Text: Lovely place, kitchen delicious, good & gentle service ;-)

Review Text: Good beer, ok food, slow service.

Name: 't Tuinfeest
Review Text: A very cozy place to grab a drink. It is located close to red light district.

Review Text: Had all 5 of main meals ,,,the chicken fajita is AWESOME
